name: Naveed Arshad
content: | Welcome to LUMS Skip to main content ApplyAdmissionsFinancial AidDonateCampus HealthNewsEventsContact Dr. Naveed ArshadProfessor Syed Babar Ali School of Science and Engineering naveedarshad@lums.edu.pk Profile Conferences, Publications and Journal Articles Dr. Naveed Arshad is a Professor and Director of the National Center in Big Data and Cloud Computing, and Director of the Energy Institute at LUMS. His research interests include energy, climate informatics, and electric vehicles. Dr. Arshad has published nearly seventy research articles in top international journals and conferences. Additionally, Dr. Arshad has authored many reports and white papers on advocacy and evidence-based policy recommendations. He co-founded multiple start-up companies in big data, energy analytics, and electric vehicles. He is serving on the Board of Directors of National Transmission and Despatch Company and has previously served on the Board of Directors of public sector SoEs. Dr. Arshad holds an MS and PhD from the University of Colorado at Boulder.
